column1: сколько музеев находится в невском районе
column2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AREAS join ADDRESSES on AREAS.ID = ADDRESSES.ID_AREA join MONUMENTS on ADDRESSES.ID = MONUMENTS.ID_ADDRESS WHERE AREAS.NAME like '%Невский%'
